name: Serendipity (RavenBP)
description:
Serendipity is a prototype/vertical slice of an action-adventure game featuring various puzzles and lite platformer elements.

Inspirations include games like Tomb Raider where the player will unlock more tools/abilities to use that can help them progress further into the game.

When the player enters the game, they will notice a glowing numbered cube, interacting with this cube is considered the "normal" way of finishing the game, however, multiple endings/cubes may exist in the game that may reward or penalize the player...

How To Play

Reach the glowing white numbered cube by gaining abilities through pickups that are located throughout the world.

Controls

Serendipity supports KBM and Gamepad input.

Credits

Developed by Raven Powless

Character Model - PO-Art

Gameplay Theme (Bluebeat 01) - ERH (CC BY-NC 3.0)
